related_post.text: Hey So I have a n00b issue here.... I have a float lets say: 0.00123 and I need to get 10% of that float. When I multiply with 1.1 or 0.1 I can get the right sum most of the times. But when I do it multiple times and float points increase  I get the e05 and my results start to mess up my script. Can anyone give me a quick lesson on this? If possible I need to fix the float length to 8 decimals and possibly round down. Suggestions?(Yes I tried stackoverflow  but I simply do not understand the answer: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22756324/howtoavoide05inpython)

so_post.text: Hey So I have a n00b issue here.... I have a float lets say: 0.00123 and I need to get 10% of that float. When I multiply with 1.1 or 0.1 I can get the right sum most of the times.
